version_description: Various bug fixes and optimizations to improve overall user experience for Vikings as they explore and play through School of Dragons.

Dreadfall has arrived at campus, covering the school grounds with pumpkins, spiderwebs, and everything spooky! Vikings can begin collecting candies and earning time-limited rewards by participating in the many Dreadfall activities. Those participating can look forward to:
• Bonestormer – new hybrid dragon
• Bonestormer Dreadfall skin
• New Dreadfall themed racetracks
• 8 new Dreadfall themed Dragon Tactics levels
• 2 new Dreadfall missions
• 20 daily quests
• Dreadfall themed stable quests
• New Dreadfall maze
Dreadfall has ended, but check out campus for the year's first snowfall!

Snoggletog has returned! Celebrate the event of the season with the following:
• The all-new Mystery Class Chimeragon
• Festive décor throughout campus
• New and old seasonal racetracks
• Themed Dragon Tactics levels
• Snoggletog mazes
• Tons of new and old store items


Additional quality-of-life updates include:
• Six egg incubators (you can now hatch up to six dragon eggs at a time!)
• Eels available to hunt throughout campus
• A reimagined age-up menu that more clearly outlines age-up opportunities

Snoggletog is over, but that doesn't mean there isn't stuff to do!
• Check out the 8 brand new Runestone Dragon Tactics levels!
• Another addition is the Hidden World Stable! See your dragons Glow!
• Also you asked and we listened, classic armor is back in the store in addtion with some new colors!

The snow is melting in Berk and it is time for Thawfest! You can find a ton of new features jam packed into this update!
•Released for the first time ever, the Seastormer dragon glides into campus!
•4 Brand new Thawfest themed Dragon Tactics levels!
•Thawfest themed racetracks!
•A ton of battle-ready gear to be earned!
•A bunch of other Thawfest items to collect and trade in to get the grand prize!
•Check out the updated mail system, you may find a gift!

The snow is melting in Berk and it is time for Thawfest! You can find a ton of new features jam packed into this update!
•Released for the first time ever, the Seastormer dragon glides into campus!
•4 Brand new Thawfest themed Dragon Tactics levels!
•Thawfest themed racetracks!
•A ton of battle-ready gear to be earned!
•A bunch of other Thawfest items to collect and trade in to get the grand prize!
•Check out the updated mail system, you may find a gift!

Thawfest is over, now it is time to get ready for an action packed summer!
•Minor bug fixes
